title: Motores Transitorios

title: Weather App
description: Responsive weather Consulting App that retrieves the weather of the city or country the user search for. Made with a Weather API, SASS and VueJS

title: To-Do List App
description: Simple and responsive To-Do list app where the user can add, read, delete and mark tasks as done, in progress or to-do. Made with VueJS and SASS.
updates: Add edit task feature, Fix empty task added
